item.title: R Markdown Page
item.description: This page provides an example of using R Markdown. x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 2.89 ## 2 2 -0.09 ## 3 3 3.18 ## 4 4 2.34 ## 5 5 4.76 ## 6 6 6.07 ## 7 7 6.58 ## 8 8 7.76 ## 9 9 8.33 ## 10 10 10.25 Package 1 Slides Exercises Stretch More Package 2 Slides Exercises Stretch More Package 3 Slides Exercises Stretch More
